h2_title: Where To Use The Sterness of Stone in Black Myth: Wukong
content: The Sterness of Stone can be used on the Tallies located in Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge. They allow you to access the path under the Crouching Tiger Temple, and open the locked doors at Sandgate Village - Valley of Despair and Yellow Sand Formation - Windrest Gate Shrines. You will need to use this with the Keeness of Tiger Key Item, which can be found at the Crouching Tiger Temple upon defeating the Tiger Vanguard.

The content is as follows:
The Sterness of Stone can be used on the Tallies located in Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge. They allow you to access the path under the Crouching Tiger Temple, and open the locked doors at Sandgate Village - Valley of Despair and Yellow Sand Formation - Windrest Gate Shrines. You will need to use this with the Keeness of Tiger Key Item, which can be found at the Crouching Tiger Temple upon defeating the Tiger Vanguard.
